## Events.TrashcanOpen.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `TrashcanOpen` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(opt_isOpen?: boolean, opt_workspaceId?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_isOpen | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether the trashcan flyout is opening (false if opening). Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_workspaceId | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The workspace identifier for this event. Undefined for a blank event. |
